channel.title: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!
channel.description:
1) Why do they put Braille dots on the key-pads of the drive up atms? (blind people dont drive) 2) Why does sour cream have an expiration date? 3) Why is it called "chili" if its heated when you eat it? 4) Why would somone say they "slept like a baby" unless they cried and wet themselves all night? 5) Why is it called "the World Series" when only North American teams play? 6) If nothing sitcks to Teflon how does Teflon stick to pans? 7) Why are they called "apartments" when they are all bunched together? 8) Why is a lousy driver called "reckless"? 9) Why do they report power outages on tv? 10) Why do feet smell and noses run? 11) Why do they sterilize the needles for lethal injection? (they are dying anyways...) 12) Why do they call it a "TV set" when you only get one? 13) If one syncronized swimmer drowns, what should the rest do? 14) Why are boxing rings squar?
[b]Post some answers so I can hear your input[/b] :)

item.title: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!
item.dc:creator: @Jamie1200 Jamie1200
item.description:
@Jamie1200 wrote:

Why do we say the alarm has gone off, when in actual fact it’s just come on.

Read full topic
item.source: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!

item.title: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!
item.dc:creator: @glestrts glestrts
item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

  1. Because most likely the atm’s are mass produced and its simpler to make one keypad than two different kinds.
  2. Because its a dairy product, and will go bad eventually.
  3. Because Chile is derived from a Spanish word, so why should the english definition of a homonym to the word be important at all.
  4. Because Babies have nothing to care about in there simple lives, also i doubt a baby wets itself and cries while asleep. Personally if i had to piss bad i would think id wake up.

Alright… these are just mental, change the title to ‘Idioms of the English Language’ or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!

item.title: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

  1. Because some of them can be walk-up’s too.
  2. There is a difference between sour cream and moldy cream.
  3. It is called that because you use chilli peppers in them, which are then named after the country. But you can eat it cold too.
  4. Because babies after a while tend to sleep a lot and can be quiet.
  5. That is the name they gave it?
  6. Teflon only coats the pan, it does not ‘stick to it’. If you tried hard enough you could also get food to stick to it.
  7. Why are they called “apartments” when they are all bunched together?
  8. There is a difference between ‘wreckless’ and ‘reckless’.
  9. Because people that aren’t effected might want to know about them?
  10. Check dictionary.com
  11. It’s the law.
  12. Miss Silabsoft answered this stupid question.
  13. They would probably stop the performance and call an ambulance?
  14. Because boxers used to brawl in circles drawn on the ground with chalk, called a ‘ring’. The name is still used.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

  1. If they are blind, wouldn’t that mean they can’t see the screen? The keys wouldn’t do any good.
  2. Thats the point it gets so bad, you wont even want to eat it
  3. hmmm
  4. They did, they’re leaving that out
  5. Cause we hate you
  6. A large flame
  7. To make them sound larger
  8. He hasn’t died yet has he?
  9. DUH, They want to fill up the empty space in their program
  10. not sure
  11. Who’s says that solution they are using, isn’t actually what kills them? (super aids lol)
  12. To confuse you?
  13. Swim for their lives, and hope he doesn’t come back from the dead.
  14. Why are boxing rings squar?

item.title: Funny Unanswered Life questions. See if you can answer!
item.dc:creator: @Manzarth Manzarth
item.description:
@Manzarth wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:4, topic:339688”]1) Holding someone hostage with a blindfold.
2) Cream dies in the end no matter what form it is in.
3) Because its hot and its cold, its yes and its no!
4) Chances are they gave their baby rum.
5) We could, therefore, we did.
6) Teflon is just that awesome.
7) If they were called “closements”, it sounds unappealing.
8) Because he isn’t in a wreck just yet.
9) Because they can.
10) Because you park in the driveway and you drive on the parkway.
11) For all you know, that may not be lethal enough. Why infect you?
12) Because the TV is all set and ready for use.
13) They should try to save him, yet in the end, drown as well.
14) Because circle is square, and square is circle.[/quote]
Nice answers!!! Cmon people I wanna see what you all have to say!

Read full topic

item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

  2. Cream dies in the end no matter what form it is in.
  3. Because its hot and its cold, its yes and its no!
  4. Chances are they gave their baby rum.
  5. We could, therefore, we did.
  6. Teflon is just that awesome.
  7. If they were called “closements”, it sounds unappealing.
  8. Because he isn’t in a wreck just yet.
  9. Because they can.
  10. Because you park in the driveway and you drive on the parkway.
  11. For all you know, that may not be lethal enough. Why infect you?
  12. Because the TV is all set and ready for use.
  13. They should try to save him, yet in the end, drown as well.
  14. Because circle is square, and square is circle.
